description: Schemas linted to test for naming and meta data conventions.

project_id.description: Unique identifier for the Reflekt project. MD5 hash of the project name.

profile_id.description: Unique identifier for the Reflekt profile. MD5 hash of the profile name.

schema_registry.description: The type of schema registry the schemas were pulled from.

count_schemas.description: The number of schemas pulled from the schema registry.

ci.description: Whether the command was knowingly run in a CI/CD environment. True if an environment variable `CI=true` is found.
